name: Last Anime boy: Saving loli
description: 2088 year. As it turned out, the future is not that bright. Nazi Muslims came to power. In the world, everything was banned: LGBT community, miniskirts, free parking, and most importantly banned ANIME.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp Processor: Athlon Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: Compatible with DirectX 9 Storage: 250 MB available space Additional Notes: Keyboard, mouse
